body: I just found this defense so impressive that I couldn't refrain from posting about it.  It is amazing.
body_tagged: I just found this defense so impressive that I couldn't refrain from posting about it.  It is amazing.
title: Best Dust Devils Defense ever?

replies.body: Can someone please fix the image please?  Thank you in advance.  It is broken.  I know shadow knows how to do it.
replies.body_tagged: Can someone please fix the image please?  Thank you in advance.  It is broken.  I know shadow knows how to do it.

replies.body:
I came across a defense like this once, I tunnelled from the top, waterdropped into the monument, caged myself and mined it without anyone really noticing, they were too busy destroying the blocks around it.

This defense looks amazing and works fine if you have a few people constantly looking out at the mon.
